summary: REQ-22 and REQ-23 appear implemented via updated icon references in index.html/manifest and updated BRANDING.logoPath. REQ-21 (adding newly generated PNG assets under frontend/public/assets/generated) is not evidenced in the diff summary. Two unrelated project-tracking/summary files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create new square, cleanly-cropped branding PNG assets from the user-uploaded logo photos and add them under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames (pkm-school-logo-2026-v3.dim_512x512.png, pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_512x512.png, pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_192x192.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no new files added (ADDED FILES: none) and no modifications under frontend/public/assets/generated that would indicate the required PNG assets were created/committed.
evidence: frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest (references new assets but does not add them)
frontend/index.html (references new assets but does not add them)

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state update in project_state.json (new_feature_requests entries, summary, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to modify project_state.json; it focuses on branding assets and updating icon/logo references.

hallucinated_features.description: Update to repository file summary listing (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
